books.author: by Holly Madison
books.description: Life inside the Playboy Mansion, by a former bunny and girlfriend of Hugh Hefner.
books.name: DOWN THE RABBIT HOLE

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Aziz Ansari with Eric Klinenberg
books.description: The comedian enlists a sociologist to help him understand today’s dating scene.
books.name: MODERN ROMANCE

books.author: by David McCullough
books.description: The story of the bicycle mechanics from Ohio who ushered in the age of flight; by the author of “1776” and “The Greater Journey.”
books.name: THE WRIGHT BROTHERS

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: The last voyage of the Lusitania, the passenger liner sunk by a German torpedo in 1915; by the author of “The Devil in the White City.”
books.name: DEAD WAKE

books.author: by Malala Yousafzai with Christina Lamb
books.description: The experience of the Pakistani girl who advocated for women’s education and was shot by the Taliban.
books.name: I AM MALALA

books.author: by Karen Abbott
books.description: Four courageous women in the Civil War.
books.name: LIAR, TEMPTRESS, SOLDIER, SPY

books.author: by Jimmy Carter
books.description: At 90, the 39th president (and Nobel Prize winner) reflects on his private and public life.
books.name: A FULL LIFE

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Why some people succeed; from the author of "Blink" and "The Tipping Point."
books.name: OUTLIERS

books.author: by David E. Hoffman
books.description: A biography of Adolf Tolkachev, who spied for the United States inside the Soviet Union.
books.name: THE BILLION DOLLAR SPY

books.author: by Gail Caldwell
books.description: A tribute to a deep friendship between two women writers. Originally published in 2010.
books.name: LET'S TAKE THE LONG WAY HOME

books.author: by Rinker Buck
books.description: The author and his brother travel 2,000 miles by mule and wagon from Missouri to Oregon.
books.name: THE OREGON TRAIL

books.author: by Ted Cruz
books.description: The Texas senator and Republican presidential candidate tells his personal and political story, denounces the lack of accountability in Washington and offers ideas for “reigniting the promise of America.”
books.name: A TIME FOR TRUTH

books.author: by Cokie Roberts
books.description: The news analyst details the lives of the many women (Abigail Adams and Martha Washington among them) who "raised our nation."  Originally published in 2004.
books.name: FOUNDING MOTHERS

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: How an architect and a serial killer were linked by the Chicago World's Fair of 1893.
books.name: THE DEVIL IN THE WHITE CITY
